address_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Address resource that is associated with this AuthorizationDocument.

status.description: Status of an instance resource. It can hold one of the values: 1. opened 2. signing, 3. signed LOA, 4. canceled, 5. failed. See the section entitled [Status Values](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/phone-numbers/hosted-number-authorization-documents#status-values) for more information on each of these statuses.

email.description: Email that this AuthorizationDocument will be sent to for signing.

cc_emails.description: Email recipients who will be informed when an Authorization Document has been sent and signed.

date_created.description: The date this resource was created, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

date_updated.description: The date that this resource was updated, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

account_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the account.

request_status.description: A string that shows the status of the current Bulk Hosting request, it can vary between these values: 'QUEUED','IN_PROGRESS','PROCESSED'

friendly_name.description: A 128 character string that is a human-readable text that describes this resource.

notification_email.description: Email address used for send notifications about this Bulk hosted number request.

date_created.description: The date this resource was created, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

date_completed.description: The date that this resource was completed, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

url.description: The URL of this BulkHostedNumberOrder resource.

total_count.description: The total count of phone numbers in this Bulk hosting request.

results.description: Contains a list of all the individual hosting orders and their information, for this Bulk request. Each result object is grouped by its order status. To see a complete list of order status, please check 'https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/hosted-numbers/hosted-numbers-api/hosted-number-order-resource#status-values'.

signing_document_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the LOA document associated with this HostedNumberOrder.

capabilities.description: A mapping of capabilities this hosted phone number will have enabled on Twilio's platform.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this HostedNumberOrder.

account_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the account.

incoming_phone_number_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the [IncomingPhoneNumber](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/incoming-phone-numbers) resource that represents the phone number being hosted.

address_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Address resource that represents the address of the owner of this phone number.

signing_document_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the [Authorization Document](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/phone-numbers/hosted-number-authorization-documents) the user needs to sign.

phone_number.description: Phone number to be hosted. This must be in [E.164](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164) format, e.g., +16175551212

capabilities.description: Set of booleans describing the capabilities hosted on Twilio's platform. SMS is currently only supported.

friendly_name.description: A 128 character string that is a human-readable text that describes this resource.

status.description: Status of this resource. It can hold one of the values: 1. Twilio Processing 2. Received, 3. Pending LOA, 4. Carrier Processing, 5. Completed, 6. Action Required, 7. Failed. See the [HostedNumberOrders Status Values](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/phone-numbers/hosted-numbers#status-values) section for more information on each of these statuses.

failure_reason.description: A message that explains why a hosted_number_order went to status "action-required"

date_created.description: The date this resource was created, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

date_updated.description: The date that this resource was updated, given as [GMT RFC 2822](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

email.description: Email of the owner of this phone number that is being hosted.

cc_emails.description: A list of emails that LOA document for this HostedNumberOrder will be carbon copied to.

contact_title.description: The title of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document for this phone number.

contact_phone_number.description: The contact phone number of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document.

bulk_hosting_request_sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the bulk hosting request associated with this HostedNumberOrder.

next_step.description: The next step you need to take to complete the hosted number order and request it successfully.

bundle_sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Item Assignment resource.

object_sid.description: The SID of an object bag that holds information of the different items.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Identity resource.

sid.description: The unique string that identifies the Regulation resource.

friendly_name.description: A human-readable description that is assigned to describe the Regulation resource. Examples can include Germany: Mobile - Business.

iso_country.description: The ISO country code of the phone number's country.

number_type.description: The type of phone number restricted by the regulatory requirement. For example, Germany mobile phone numbers provisioned by businesses require a business name with commercial register proof from the Handelsregisterauszug and a proof of address from Handelsregisterauszug or a trade license by Gewerbeanmeldung.

end_user_type.description: The type of End User the regulation requires - can be `individual` or `business`.

requirements.description: The SID of an object that holds the regulatory information of the phone number country, phone number type, and end user type.

url.description: The absolute URL of the Regulation resource.

info.title: Twilio - Numbers
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

get.description: Fetch a specific AuthorizationDocument.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this AuthorizationDocument.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this AuthorizationDocument.

get.description: Retrieve a list of AuthorizationDocuments belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: Email that this AuthorizationDocument will be sent to for signing.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Status of an instance resource. It can hold one of the values: 1. opened 2. signing, 3. signed LOA, 4. canceled, 5. failed. See the section entitled [Status Values](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/phone-numbers/hosted-number-authorization-documents#status-values) for more information on each of these statuses.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Create an AuthorizationDocument for authorizing the hosting of phone number capabilities on Twilio's platform.

AddressSid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Address resource that is associated with this AuthorizationDocument.

Email.description: Email that this AuthorizationDocument will be sent to for signing.

ContactPhoneNumber.description: The contact phone number of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document.

HostedNumberOrderSids.description: A list of HostedNumberOrder sids that this AuthorizationDocument will authorize for hosting phone number capabilities on Twilio's platform.

ContactTitle.description: The title of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document for this phone number.

CcEmails.description: Email recipients who will be informed when an Authorization Document has been sent and signed.

get.description: Fetch a specific BulkHostedNumberOrder.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this BulkHostedNumberOrder.

parameters.name: OrderStatus
parameters.description: Order status can be used for filtering on Hosted Number Order status values. To see a complete list of order statuses, please check 'https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/hosted-numbers/hosted-numbers-api/hosted-number-order-resource#status-values'.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

Email.description: The email address that will receive updates when the Bundle resource changes status.

StatusCallback.description: The URL we call to inform your application of status changes.

RegulationSid.description: The unique string of a regulation that is associated to the Bundle resource.

IsoCountry.description: The [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the Bundle's phone number country ownership request.

EndUserType.description: The [type of End User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/regulatory/api/end-user-types) of the Bundle resource.

NumberType.description: The type of phone number of the Bundle's ownership request. Can be `local`, `mobile`, `national`, or `toll free`.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Bundles for an account.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The verification status of the Bundle resource. Please refer to [Bundle Statuses](https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/regulatory/api/bundles#bundle-statuses) for more details.

parameters.name: FriendlyName
parameters.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource. The column can contain 255 variable characters.

parameters.name: RegulationSid
parameters.description: The unique string of a [Regulation resource](https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/regulatory/api/regulations) that is associated to the Bundle resource.

parameters.name: IsoCountry
parameters.description: The 2-digit [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) of the Bundle's phone number country ownership request.

parameters.name: NumberType
parameters.description: The type of phone number of the Bundle's ownership request. Can be `local`, `mobile`, `national`, or `tollfree`.

parameters.name: HasValidUntilDate
parameters.description: Indicates that the Bundle is a valid Bundle until a specified expiration date.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Can be `valid-until` or `date-updated`. Defaults to `date-created`.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.description: Default is `DESC`. Can be `ASC` or `DESC`.

parameters.name: ValidUntilDate
parameters.description: Date to filter Bundles having their `valid_until_date` before or after the specified date. Can be `ValidUntilDate>=` or `ValidUntilDate<=`. Both can be used in conjunction as well. [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) is the acceptable date format.

parameters.name: ValidUntilDate<
parameters.description: Date to filter Bundles having their `valid_until_date` before or after the specified date. Can be `ValidUntilDate>=` or `ValidUntilDate<=`. Both can be used in conjunction as well. [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) is the acceptable date format.

parameters.name: ValidUntilDate>
parameters.description: Date to filter Bundles having their `valid_until_date` before or after the specified date. Can be `ValidUntilDate>=` or `ValidUntilDate<=`. Both can be used in conjunction as well. [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) is the acceptable date format.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.

Email.description: The email address that will receive updates when the Bundle resource changes status.

parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.

parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Bundle to be copied.

delete.description: Cancel the HostedNumberOrder (only available when the status is in `received`).

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this HostedNumberOrder.

get.description: Retrieve a list of HostedNumberOrders belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The Status of this HostedNumberOrder. One of `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, `pending-loa`, `carrier-processing`, `testing`, `completed`, `failed`, or `action-required`.

parameters.name: SmsCapability
parameters.description: Whether the SMS capability will be hosted on our platform. Can be `true` of `false`.

parameters.name: PhoneNumber
parameters.description: An E164 formatted phone number hosted by this HostedNumberOrder.

parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the IncomingPhoneNumber resource created by this HostedNumberOrder.

parameters.name: FriendlyName
parameters.description: A human readable description of this resource, up to 128 characters.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Host a phone number's capability on Twilio's platform.

PhoneNumber.description: The number to host in [+E.164](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164) format

ContactPhoneNumber.description: The contact phone number of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document.

AddressSid.description: Optional. A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Address resource that represents the address of the owner of this phone number.

Email.description: Optional. Email of the owner of this phone number that is being hosted.

AccountSid.description: This defaults to the AccountSid of the authorization the user is using. This can be provided to specify a subaccount to add the HostedNumberOrder to.

FriendlyName.description: A 128 character string that is a human readable text that describes this resource.

CcEmails.description: Optional. A list of emails that the LOA document for this HostedNumberOrder will be carbon copied to.

SmsUrl.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the phone number. This will be copied onto the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

SmsMethod.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsUrl. Must be either `GET` or `POST`.  This will be copied onto the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

SmsFallbackUrl.description: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl. This will be copied onto the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

SmsCapability.description: Used to specify that the SMS capability will be hosted on Twilio's platform.

SmsFallbackMethod.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsFallbackUrl. Must be either `GET` or `POST`. This will be copied onto the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

StatusCallbackUrl.description: Optional. The Status Callback URL attached to the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

StatusCallbackMethod.description: Optional. The Status Callback Method attached to the IncomingPhoneNumber resource.

SmsApplicationSid.description: Optional. The 34 character sid of the application Twilio should use to handle SMS messages sent to this number. If a `SmsApplicationSid` is present, Twilio will ignore all of the SMS urls above and use those set on the application.

ContactTitle.description: The title of the person authorized to sign the Authorization Document for this phone number.

parameters.name: BundleSid
parameters.description: The unique string that we created to identify the Bundle resource.

ObjectSid.description: The SID of an object bag that holds information of the different items.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Regulations.

parameters.name: EndUserType
parameters.description: The type of End User the regulation requires - can be `individual` or `business`.

parameters.name: IsoCountry
parameters.description: The ISO country code of the phone number's country.

parameters.name: NumberType
parameters.description: The type of phone number that the regulatory requiremnt is restricting.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

get.description: Fetch specific Regulation Instance.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Regulation resource.

post.description: Replaces all bundle items in the target bundle (specified in the path) with all the bundle items of the source bundle (specified by the from_bundle_sid body param)

parameters.name: BundleSid
parameters.description: The unique string that identifies the Bundle where the item assignments are going to be replaced.

FromBundleSid.description: The source bundle sid to copy the item assignments from.

FriendlyName.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

Type.description: The type of the Supporting Document.

Attributes.description: The set of parameters that are the attributes of the Supporting Documents resource which are derived Supporting Document Types.
